turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order coffee from starbucks for pickup, can you do that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, which starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on market street in ballard

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are two starbucks at market street in ballard

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one across from where they hold the sunday farmer's market

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That would be the location at 2200 northwest market street. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing, black

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, how about also two small hot chocolates

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I cannot find a drink called hot chocolate on the menu

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe it's not on the menu but I had it there before, just order it and if they don't have it don't get anything

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am ordering a large americano black and two small hot chocolates, substituting nothing if they don't have hot chocolate

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When will you be able to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At 4PM. Wait, can you check if they are open now since there's a snowstorm?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are open until 7PM today. Do you want me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is placed, you will receive a confirmation and code in your email shortly
